actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Armed Services with amendment, S. Rept. 93-781.
Senate vacated its action of passage on 5/6/1974.
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H.R. 12565 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations during the fiscal year 1974 for procurement of aircraft, missiles, naval vessels, tracked combat vehicles, and other weapons and research, development, test and evaluation for the Armed Forces, and to authorize construction at certain installations.
short_title: Department of Defense Supplemental Appropriation Authorization Act

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Department of Defense Supplemental Appropriation Authorization Act - =Title I: Procurement= - Enumerates authorized appropriations during fiscal year 1974 for the use of the Armed Forces of the United States for procurement of aircraft, missiles, naval vessels, tracked combat vehicles, and other weapons authorized by law. =Title II: Research, Development, Test and Evaluation= - Enumerates authorized appropriations for the fiscal year 1974 for the use of the Armed Forces of the United States for research, development, test and evalutation. =Title III: Military Construction= - Authorizes the appropriation of not in excess of $3,866,000 during the fiscal year 1974 for maintenance of real property in support of military family housing.

titles.title: Department of Defense Supplemental Appropriation Authorization Act

A bill to authorize appropriations during the fiscal year 1974 for procurement of aircraft, missiles, naval vessels, tracked combat vehicles, and other weapons and research, development, test and evaluation for the Armed Forces, and to authorize construction at certain installations.
